```{r}
rm(list = ls())

library(mosaic)
library(tidyr)
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
page <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_past_and_future_population"
XPATH <- '//*[@id="mw-content-text"]/div/table[2]' 
table_list <- 
  page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(xpath = XPATH) %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
Pop_Country <- table_list[[1]]
head(Pop_Country)
```
